translations: n.<非标准>一半（half 的复数，同 halves）

sentences.sentence: "213 pieces of halfs ……" number just on exporting, Ni gram the definition that just understood him.
sentences.translation: “213块半……”数字甫一出口，尼克才明白了他的意思。

sentences.sentence: Break off a pack of instant noodle into a half without open it, and keep breaking off the halfs into another half.......
sentences.translation: 把一包没有开封的方便面隔着包装掰成两半，再把两半各掰成两半……，这样循环掰下去。
